intro: Chouxia saboureaui, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its upright, compact growth habit. The plant features velvety, dark green leaves and produces showy, clustered flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white. It is well-suited for indoor cultivation due to its preference for bright, indirect light and consistent moisture. Chouxia saboureaui is popular for its ornamental value and ease of care.
